publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2607 Mike Pringle: Zimbabwe Elections—That the Parliament welcomes the elections in Zimbabwe on 31 March 2005; calls on the people of Zimbabwe to turn out and exercise their hard-won and democratic right; notes that previous elections have been invalidated by intimidation and vote-rigging by the ruling Zanu-PF party of Robert Mugabe, and further calls on the international community to monitor that this election is carried out in a free and fair way so that the result fully reflects the future hopes and aspirations of the people of Zimbabwe.
